overview: White Witch leads you through the seedy underbelly of the City of Angels. Rourke, a private detective with a broken past is enlisted to locate a man. A significant lead is a white witch who gives him a mysterious tea concoction that sends him into a series of flashbacks. The suspense is palpable, as bodies begin to pile up and the realization that a name and career change are not enough to shake the devil from his scent.
title: White Witch
